content.value_statement: Proxmox storage management is complex and time-consuming. This skill provides AI-powered tools to monitor, analyze, and optimize your storage infrastructure effortlessly.
actual_capabilities: List all storage devices in Proxmox cluster
Get storage capacity and utilization details
Track storage allocation for VMs and containers
Identify storage bottlenecks and performance issues
limitations: Requires Proxmox VE MCP server installation
Only works with Proxmox Virtual Environment
Actual implementation depends on MCP server codebase
Limited to storage operations exposed by Proxmox API

best_practices: Monitor storage capacity weekly to avoid unexpected full disks
Maintain at least 20% free space on all storage devices for optimal performance
Use different storage tiers for different workload types like SSD for VMs and HDD for backups
anti_patterns: Ignoring storage alerts until disks are completely full
Storing VM disks and backups on the same storage device
Not planning storage expansion until reaching 95% capacity

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Proxmox versions?
faq.answer: The skill works with Proxmox VE 6.0 and later versions that support the API endpoints used by the MCP server.

faq.question: What are the storage monitoring limits?
faq.answer: Limits depend on your Proxmox cluster size. The skill can monitor unlimited nodes and storage devices within a single cluster.

faq.question: How does this integrate with existing monitoring tools?
faq.answer: The skill complements existing tools by providing AI-powered analysis and natural language queries for storage management tasks.

faq.question: Is my storage data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill only reads storage information through Proxmox API. It cannot modify or delete any storage data.

faq.question: The skill is not showing my storage devices. What is wrong?
faq.answer: Ensure your Proxmox VE MCP server is running and properly configured with API credentials for your cluster.

faq.question: How does this compare to Proxmox built-in storage management?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered insights and natural language interface while using Proxmox native APIs under the hood.
